title: New: Dead Gaze – It's Not Real
body:
The speed in which the artists over at the **[Cats Purring](http://www.catspurring.com/)** have been churning out beautiful pop gems is almost startling. In the last two weeks the Oxford (Mississippi) based collective has featured on the site twice, through **[Dent May](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10227-new-dent-may-wedding-day/ "New: Dent May – Wedding Day")** and **[Gray Things](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10237-new-gray-things-class/ "New: Gray Things – Class")** respectively. It’s now the turn of **[Dead Gaze](http://www.myspace.com/deadgazetunes)**, who’ve just announced they’re to release their new record on NY based label **Group Tightener**. With the new announcement came a new track, entitled **_It’s Not Real_**. Appropriately titled it seems; the track is a hazy, fuzzy and angsty in all the right places. A jam for the surrealist teenager, if they even exist.

Pre-order the physical release [here.](http://grouptightener.tumblr.com/post/9337246578/deadgaze10)

[Dead Gaze – It’s Not Real](http://soundcloud.com/group-tightener/dead-gaze-its-not-real) by [Group Tightener](http://soundcloud.com/group-tightener)
